newsitem.title: USA: FOB Gulf Grain - Corn, soy, SRW wheat basis down.
newsitem.headline: FOB Gulf Grain - Corn, soy, SRW wheat basis down.

text.p: U.S. FOB Gulf corn, soybean and soft red winter wheat basis offers were down several cents for some months in reaction to weak demand by exporters, grain dealers said.
Basis pressure was anticipated because river traffic should be moving easily later this month when high water subsides on the Mississippi River, dealers said.
Also, dealers said the export tender lineup is thin for corn, soybeans and wheat lessening the need for supplies at the Gulf.
CORN (No. 3 yellow, FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu) -
-- Bid Chng Offer Chng
April 11-30 unq + K nc +21 + K dn 1
May unq + K nc +19 + K dn 3
June unq + N nc +22 + N dn 1
July unq + N nc +22 + N dn 1
August unq + U nc +22 + U nc
Note: K=CBOT May, N=CBOT July, U=CBOT Sept, nc=no comparison.

-- Bid Chng Offer Chng

May 1-20 unq + K nc +21 + K nc

FH June unq + N nc +23 + N nc
LH June unq + N nc +25 + N unc

Note K=CBOT May, N=CBOT July, nc=no comparison

((Chicago newsdesk 312-408-8720))
